## isValidLiveChannelAddress() function

### isValidLiveChannelAddress() function

Check if the address has a scope, namespace, and path

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function isValidLiveChannelAddress(addr?: LiveChannelAddress): addr is LiveChannelAddress;
```
